title: 37.....Menopause.....Wait....WHAT??
description: This is a book about being 37 and having a hysterectomy. This books shows my life from finding out I had a huge mass in my female reproductive system all the way to the hysterectomy and there after. I want to let women know they aren't alone having this done so young. Especially when you want to have children and it's taken away from you. It's a serious topic but I try to find some humor in it.Available at Barnes And Nobles
author: Jennifer Pawlowski
